leboff:dashboards:runninguser.description: Modify the dashboard running user or view as option

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetdevhubusername.name: targetdevhubusername
targetdevhubusername.description: username or alias for the dev hub org; overrides default dev hub org

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

developername.name: developername
developername.description: The developer name of the dashboard to modify

dashboardtype.name: dashboardtype
dashboardtype.description: The Dashboard running user type. Acceptable values are LoggedInUser, SpecifiedUser, and MyTeamUser

userwhereclause.name: userwhereclause
userwhereclause.description: Where clause used to find the running user. Required if type is SpecifiedUser

leboff:flows:deactivate.description: Deactivate a Flow based on API Name

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetdevhubusername.name: targetdevhubusername
targetdevhubusername.description: username or alias for the dev hub org; overrides default dev hub org

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

developername.name: developername
developername.description: The developer name of the flow to deactivate

namespaceprefix.name: namespaceprefix
namespaceprefix.description: Use to specify a specific namespace prefix

leboff:flows:delete.description: Delete a Flow and all versions based on API Name

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetdevhubusername.name: targetdevhubusername
targetdevhubusername.description: username or alias for the dev hub org; overrides default dev hub org

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

developername.name: developername
developername.description: The developer name of the flow to deactivate

namespaceprefix.name: namespaceprefix
namespaceprefix.description: Use to specify a specific namespace prefix

leboff:reports:move.description: Move reports from one folder to another

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetdevhubusername.name: targetdevhubusername
targetdevhubusername.description: username or alias for the dev hub org; overrides default dev hub org

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

developername.name: developername
developername.description: The developer name of the report to move

whereclause.name: whereclause
whereclause.description: Where clause used to find reports to move

foldername.name: foldername
foldername.description: The developer name of the folder to move the reports to
